original: The  competency based interview questions  are asked  to judge the capability of the candidates . These questions may be asked to know about your weak points, decision making capacity, teamwork skills, responsibility, communication skills, problem solving skills and your managerial decisions etc.
result: Competency-based interview questions are used to assess a candidate's abilities and skills. They are designed to uncover weaknesses, decision-making abilities, teamwork, communication, problem solving, and managerial decisions. These questions help the interviewer understand the candidate's suitability for the role.

original: You must very alert while answering these questions. Firstly, choose some of the key competencies stated in the job description and think of some examples for each one. You should answer according to the intensity of the question.
result: It's important to be attentive when responding to interview questions. Begin by identifying several of the main competencies listed in the job description and brainstorming specific examples for each one. Adapting your answers to the tone and level of each question is also crucial. Avoid copying content directly and strive to convey the information in your own words.

original: For example:  If the company is looking for someone with excellent team work and leadership skills, you should think of a scenario in which you have demonstrated this. You can also describe a group presentation you have undertaken at school or college level.
result: When responding to a job advertisement, it's important to highlight your skills and experiences that match the requirements mentioned in the posting. To do this effectively, think of specific instances where you've demonstrated the desired skills or qualities. For instance, if the job requires strong teamwork and leadership abilities, recall a situation where you exhibited these traits. It could be a successful collaborative project you worked on in college or a similar scenario.

original: I believe to emphasize the features of the product or service that reduces costs and solves problems of the customers. It works wonder and most of the times they make their mind to buy the products.
result: In my opinion, it is effective to highlight the benefits of a product or service that can help customers save money and solve their problems. This approach can persuade customers to purchase the product.

original: For example:  If I have to sell woolen uniform, I don't only emphasize the wool's durability and lasting value of it otherwise I mainly focus on the look and feel of the product.
result: Suppose I am tasked with promoting the sale of woolen uniforms. Instead of solely highlighting the material's strength and long-lasting properties, I would primarily emphasize the garment's appearance and tactile experience.

original: I was very happy to be accepted to my first choice, BHU. It is a very prestigious university. I had some friends and some seniors who were a few years older than me that attended and they seemed to have a good experience on that college. I was familiar with that city and have local contacts so I chose.
result: When I received the news of my acceptance to BHU, I was overjoyed as it had been my top pick. BHU is a renowned institution and I had heard positive feedback from my acquaintances who were either my seniors or peers at the University. Moreover, I had some familiarity with the city and had contacts there which influenced my decision to join BHU.

original: I think, it is better to work under pressure but the pressure should be good. I always love to work with a deadline and enjoy working in a challenging environment. Generally, I react to situations rather than to stress and that's way the situation is handled and doesn't become stressful.
result: In my opinion, it is beneficial to work in an environment where there is a certain degree of pressure, as it keeps me motivated. However, it is important that the pressure is healthy and manageable. I always welcome tasks with strict deadlines as it gives me a sense of urgency and helps me work efficiently under pressure. Instead of getting stressed out, I prefer to respond to situations tactfully. By doing so, I can keep things under control and avoid feeling overwhelmed by stress.

original: For example:  When I find an unsatisfied customer, rather than feeling stressed, I focus on the task on hand. I believe my ability to communicate effectively and satisfy the customer.
result: As an illustration, when confronted with a dissatisfied customer, I remain calm and concentrate on identifying their needs. I firmly believe in my capability to communicate proficiently and resolve any issues to their satisfaction.

original: I always love to talk with my colleagues in a decent tone and a loving manner. It always works and I don't think I have any serious conflict with any of my friend or colleague. But I remember, this incident was occurred 4 years ago, in my college life. We, four friends were stuck in a very worse condition. We all falsely charged fine and 15 days suspension for ragging a new comer fresher student. We all were upset and angry but it was me who take an initiative and discuss the whole condition with the principal and get rid from the fine and suspension.
result: In my professional life, I always communicate with my colleagues in a respectful and cordial manner, which helps to avoid misunderstandings and conflicts. However, there was an incident that occurred four years ago during my college days. A group of four friends including me falsely accused a new student of ragging, resulting in a fine and a 15-day suspension. I decided to take the lead and approach the principal to discuss the situation, which led to the removal of the penalties imposed on us.

original: I think my biggest failure was not being selected as an Indian Army officer because I was diagnosed with night vision problem. I was very determined to go there but I couldn't.
result: One of my most significant disappointments in life was being turned down as an Indian Army officer due to my night vision issue. I had a strong desire to pursue this career path, but unfortunately, it didn't work out.

original: In five years, I hope to be working with an employer in an increasingly responsible position, it is because it wants to utilize my talents and work closely with my colleagues in solving important problems. I see myself taking on new and exciting challenges in an enjoyable environment and hopefully this will be with your company.
result: Within the next five years, my goal is to secure a position in an organization where I can utilize my skills to solve critical problems and work collaboratively with my colleagues. I envision myself pushing boundaries and accepting new challenges within a vibrant and enjoyable work environment, and I hope to achieve this with your esteemed company.
